description:
Introducing the Men's Expedition Pants! New to our technical outdoor clothing collection, these pants will quickly prove themselves worthy of your longest hikes.

Made of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, these pants are lightweight and extensible to allow you to excel in all your favourite activities. Offering great freedom of movement, they are perfect for canoe-camping expeditions and days spent under the sun thanks to their UPF 50+ UV certification.

Perfect for everyday wear, you can tweak the look with its adjustable drawstring ankles for a more versatile fit. A winning piece all around.
name: Hooke Expedition Pants - Mens
